short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension for searching multiple sites quickly and easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WTF? Search is a search extension for most modern web browsers. It allows you to perform detailed searches on multiple websites all in one go. Enter a search term, then click on a Search Set. Boom, WTF? Search will open a set of tabs for you to review. This allows for much more granular search of the web sites you care about than most web searches give you.

WTF? Search is almost infinitely expandable. Edit the sample searches or build your own Search Set from scratch. Most websites have a Search function. When you search for something, the URL at the top changes. If the URL exposes the search, you can harness that into WTF? Search.
